wikipedia_page.main: Keith Harris Todd (2 March 1941 – 8 January 2022) was a Welsh professional footballer who played in the Football League as a forward. He also played for Clydach United before joining Swansea, and spent seven years at Pembroke Borough after his time with Swansea. Todd died on 8 January 2022, at the age of 80.

response: * 8 January 2022: Keith Todd, 80, Swansea Town forward.
